Smitten Vorbos:
I fell in love with? Can this be love? That's it. So, I love her! Because of her, my heart hurt so much.
Recently, the Turek Orcs found a strange vortex. Since they do not own. Sometimes from the vortex of Spirits appear. And the Turek Orcs catch them.
They want to enslave helpless Spirits and be made to serve him. I couldn't look at it, so threw their relatives and left the camp.
